channel.title: Posts on Walker Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Walker Lab

item.title: 3D proteins in real life!
item.description: If you have a mobile phone, you can play with some WalkerLab proteins in real life, courtesy of Umberto Raucci. Go here and type the molecule name of your choice! Alternatively, the following QR codes will display specific proteins relevant to our proposed research. Open up your mobile phone camera app and hover it over the following images; it will ask if you would like to follow a link to display the image interactively on your phone.

item.title: Let's go WalkerLab
item.description: Coming soon to a university near you, if you live in the Detroit area. :)
